name: World Muncher
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 34. http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=66076

Rotate the World Muncher and collect stuff (they stick to you).

Use that stuff as armor and block incoming projectiles (red stuff hurts!).

Stay alive until the timer hits 0.

Controls:

Left arrow/A - Rotate left

Right arrow/D - Rotate right
